title: Can anyone crack this code? In order to win the grand prize, Benny has to crack this secret code. Given the clues, help Ben to crack the code: 8 3 __ __ 6 5. - Quora

response.answer_text: No, nobody can crack that code. You haven’t included the clues, anything could be in the missing spaces. Sure, it could be the numbers 7 and 4, but it could also be orangutan and the population of Bel Air, MD. Because “codes” are not the same as ciphers, they don’t obey rules at all. Instead of the “can anyone crack this code” and “grand prize” stuff, which is extraneous, try to include the information needed.
I'd say 7 and 4. The sequence is then formed after the first number, from left to right: Subtract 5, add 4, subtract 3, add 2, subtract 1 Which forms a pattern
